problem: Given Z is the midpoint of VX. Z is the midpoint of WY and VX . Complete the proof that VW∥XY . (Elements:  XZ ,  YZ ,  ∠XZY ,  △VWZ ,  XY ,  ∠VWZ ,  ∠VZW ,  △XYZ ,  VZ ,  WZ ,  ∠XYZ ,  VW , )
statement: Z is the midpoint of WY
Z is the midpoint of VX
reason: Converse of Alternate Interior Angles Theorem
